events.title: Events
events.description: Events can be attached either declaratively in React, or imperatively in vanilla JS.

intro.title: Tutorial Intro
intro.description: Let's discover Docusaurus in less than 5 minutes.

mixins/layout.title: Layout
mixins/layout.description: The Layout mixin can be used to inform rendering logic inside your React components.

mixins/meta.title: Meta
mixins/meta.description: The Meta mixin allows you to inject additional context that doesn't belong to the items array or a static rule. For example, a filter might be dependent on a user's purchase history, or their browser preferences.

mixins/pagination.title: Pagination
mixins/pagination.description: If the numItemsPerPage property is set, Finder will paginate items and groups.

react/finder-content.title: FinderContent
react/finder-content.description: FinderContent accepts a set of renderProps, and will determine the most appropriate state to display. Only a single state can be active at a time.

react/finder-search-term.title: FinderSearchTerm
react/finder-search-term.description: This handy component allows you to highlight the segments in your haystack that matched your searchTerm.

rules/filter.title: Filter
rules/filter.description: Define a filter predicate that will return a boolean for each item. If multiple filters are active, all filters must match for an item to be returned.

rules/search.title: Search
rules/search.description: Search by picking haystacks from your items

utils/type-guards.title: Type Guards
utils/type-guards.description: Ensures that rules have the correct shape.
